title: Journey of Fabio Pacchioni
creator_credit: United Nations Television, Unesco, Ben Park and Sidney Reichman
brief_description: The Italian theatre director, Fabio Pacchioni, was sent to Ecuador by UNESCO to establish a national theatre. Shows his activities, not only in recruiting and training a corps of actors, but also in projecting his own belief in the social responsibility of the theatre. The company toured remote villages and became acquainted with the people.
